sql:
SELECT 
  Classes.teacher_id, 
  Teachers.teacher_details, 
  Classes.student_id, 
  Students.bio_data, 
  Students.student_details
FROM 
  Classes
JOIN 
  Teachers ON Classes.teacher_id = Teachers.teacher_id
JOIN 
  Students ON Classes.student_id = Students.student_id;
question: List the details for all the pairs of teachers and students who are in the same class.
